ai-iti33:1.1_0: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti33:2.1_0: “Mendicants, a person with two qualities is raised up to heaven.
ai-iti33:2.4_0: A person who has these two qualities is is raised up to heaven.”
ai-iti33:2.5_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-iti33:3.5_0: when their body breaks up, that wise person
ai-iti33:4.1_0: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti33:4.2_0: The sixth offering to an individual.
